title: Titanic
description: A romance between a socialite and a young artist unfolds aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic in 1912.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine on the alien world Pandora must choose between following orders and protecting the Na’vi.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The surviving heroes unite for one final mission to undo Thanos’s snap and restore the universe.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies battle Thanos as he seeks all six Infinity Stones.

title: Iron Man
description: Billionaire engineer Tony Stark builds a high-tech suit of armor and becomes the armored Avenger.

title: Black Panther
description: T’Challa returns to Wakanda to claim the throne and confronts a challenger with a radical vision.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Imprisoned on a distant world, Thor must escape and stop the prophesied destruction of Asgard.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A band of misfits must work together to keep a powerful orb out of the wrong hands.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind pushing Gotham into chaos.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing is offered redemption by planting an idea.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker learns reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against its controllers.

description: Luke Skywalker joins the Rebellion to destroy the Empire’s planet-killing Death Star.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: Frodo begins a perilous quest to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone
description: An orphan discovers he’s a wizard and starts his first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A preview tour of a dinosaur theme park turns deadly when security systems fail.

title: Frozen
description: Princess Elsa’s ice powers trap the kingdom in winter; her sister Anna sets out to bring her back.

title: The Lion King
description: After tragedy, young lion Simba must confront his past and reclaim his place as king.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
description: Captain Jack Sparrow teams up to rescue the governor’s daughter and face a crew of cursed pirates.
